trans-unit.source: Represents a list of items in a document.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un elenco di elementi in un documento.

trans-unit.source: A ListStructure can be a child of the following document structure elements: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableCellStructure> - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> (when the list is nested in an outer list)
trans-unit.target: Un ListStructure può essere un elemento figlio degli elementi di struttura documento seguenti:- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure>- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableCellStructure>- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>(quando l'elenco è annidato in un elenco esterno)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableCellStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SectionStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a list item to the list.
This method has not been implemented.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non è stato implementato.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro supporta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dell'infrastruttura e non deve essere utilizzato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>.
Only <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> can be a child of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure> and there must be at least one child.
trans-unit.target: Solo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>può essere un figlio di <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>e deve essere presente almeno un elemento figlio.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>

trans-unit.source: value is not one of the types that can be a child of this class.
trans-unit.target: valuenon è uno dei tipi che possono essere un figlio di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il contenuto di un nodo di testo all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
